executiveSummary: JD Clarage and Charles Manning from XCraft pitched their innovative drone technology combining helicopter precision and airplane speed, seeking $500,000 for 20% equity. After multiple offers and a competitive bidding process, all five sharks collectively invested $1.5 million for 25% equity, forming a rare full-shark syndicate deal valuing the company at $6 million.
keyDecisions: All five sharks agreed to invest collectively $1.5 million for 25% equity in XCraft at a $6 million valuation.

actionItems.task: Scale production of the X+1 drone to reduce manufacturing costs
Complete development of the PhoneDrone product
Collaborate with the shark investors to leverage their operational expertise and networks

nextSteps: XCraft will begin scaling production of the X+1, finalize development of the PhoneDrone, and work with all five shark investors to operationalize and commercialize their drone technology.
